cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: mole cricket, Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
Platypleura kaempferi, a kind of cicada
lit. short-lived cicada does not know the seasons; fig. to see only a small piece of the big picture
exm.pyn: huì gū bù zhī chūn qiū

exm.mng: Gryllolaptaptidae family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera, mole crickets
